name: Le monde est petit (Renar)
description:
VR mini-game i made for the VR JAM 2021.

The theme was : Small World

Le monde est petit (The world is small) 

Is a popular French expression whe use when you randomly bump into someone you know.

Find in the little city the character you were talking to and touch him to win.

Tested on Oculus Quest (via Airlink).
I don't know if the game run well on other VR headsets.

The mini-game is far from perfect, still a lot to debug/improve but hey that's a game jam project ;-)

I hope you enjoy it !

Made with Unity and the VR Interaction Framework
Assets used : Tiny_Toony_City_Demo and SimpleSky
